channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 07:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 7, 04:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/03/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E101 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack E101 to racks E103 and E105.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101A19/B08/B11/B12
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 20, 07:00 - 10:00 UTC

Feb 3, 12:39 UTC
Update - Operations on this maintenance have been postponed to a later date.

Below is the new schedule:
Start time : 20/02/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/02/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will migrate servers one by one from racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 to rack E105A08.

Jan 23, 16:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified racks.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 12/02/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 12/02/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will migrate servers one by one from racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 to rack E105A08.

item.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack B710B14
item.description:
Feb 16, 19:04 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 16, 19:04 UTC
Update - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Dedicated Servers in BHS7, have been resolved
Start Time : 16/02/2025 18:15 UTC
End Time : 16/02/2025 18:36 UTC
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Feb 16, 18:27 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Dedicated Servers in BHS7, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details:

Start time : 16/02/2025 18:15 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack B710B14 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Network equipment malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible
We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G114A18

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Feb 16, 17:33 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Dedicated Servers in GRA1, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details:

Start time : 16/02/2025 17:22 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack G114A18 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Cooling system module malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible
We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SBG5][Dedicated Servers] - Rack SBG0506B07B
item.description:
Feb 15, 03:16 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on rack SBG0506B07B has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 15/02/2025 01:12 UTC
End time : 15/02/2025 03:10 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 15, 01:27 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 15/02/2025 01:12 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : vRack network is temporarily unavailable for servers in rack SBG0506B07B.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers through vRack network.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 15, 01:24 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
